text: <@U0Z41KY5V> I don't know what the latest is on this front but we did have a discussion a while ago splitting the project into different repos and one proposal was to go pretty far down that path and have many different repos
some of us (me included) pushed back on this and we ended up with a compromise with a few repos
I suspect this is something that will evolve overtime though
thanks, arnaud. I talked with gari, and he also think should keep the pace currently. We may consider this decouple in future for a more clear code structure.
